name: Ars for SDL and FreeType
short_description: The Ars4SdlnFt is a general purpose library framework working with SDL, SDL_mixer, SDL_Image and Freetype. It is the result of my furstration facing the "Why do you want to make it easy if you can do it difficult, hard, intricate and complicated".
